en: \nb[SAGES]\n[1], it's been forever!\. How goes it?
\nb[OURHERO]King, Sages, you'd better sit tight. I have a ton of new and exciting stories to tell.
it: \nb[NOSTROEROE]Re, saggi, ho tante avventure nuove ed incredibili da raccontarvi!

en: \nb[GRIN]\n[1]!\| You didn't really think we'd leave you behind like that?
it: \nb[GRIN]\n[1]!\| Non crederai che ti lasciamo qui?
